:py:mod:`utils.print_functions`
===============================

.. py:module:: utils.print_functions


Module Contents
---------------


Functions
~~~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   utils.print_functions.print_config_info



.. py:function:: print_config_info(arguments, dataset, task)

   Print info of current configuration.
   :param arguments: arguments specified by the user
   :param dataset: dataset used for optimization
   :param task: task that was detected
